summary:
Are you bored to be the best, the only one, the great Dovahkiin? Here's a new opponent.
Lilith use her own fighting style, her own combat class and new powers.
Have fun fighting or use her for your own mod and quest.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=red][b]The Dragon Bored (Lilith NPC)[/b][/color][/size][/center]

Why bring liters of magic potions? Why have dozens of unnecessary shouts and spells? You'll never use in combat, even with your most formidable opponent. You are the best, you are the Dovahkiin, you could destroy the entire Skyrim but after all you are The Dragon Bored.

Here's to you an enemy as powerful as you, or maybe even more.

[center][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2r20z5t.jpg[/img][/center]

Lilith is a demon vampire. She is an NPC who uses her own fighting style and has her own class of combat. You can find her just outside of Whiterun, to the west, into the clearing where the stream flows and there are crabs, near the camp of giants.
Now she is leveled 2.5x the player level, much powerful you are and more mana she gain and more powers she will have.  To be sure to have her properly leveled start the mod with a game saved in an interior cell. If you do not see her is perhaps because she is made invisible; she will find you! Have fun fighting with her.
Feel free to insert her in your quest but ask permisson to Lustrianna to use the armor. Let me know where you used her.

[size=4][color=orange][b]Magic:[/b] What can she do?[/color][/size]
[u]Weak shock wave[/u] - Unbalances the opponent. Value resist: none.
[u]Strong shock wave[/u] - Throws the opponent and can disarm. Value resist: none.
[u]Shock wave at 360 °[/u] -  Throws all her opponents. The closest rivals suffer more damage can be disarmed and the armor can deteriorate for 10 seconds. Value resist: magic resist, damage resist.
[u]Bats[/u] - Lilith becomes invisible for 6 seconds. The bats absorb the health and vigor. Increases the movement speed and attack. Value resist: magic resist
[u]Invisibility[/u] - Become invisible and create a bank of fog. Resistant to magic attacks. Restore her health. Increase the speed of movement.
[u]Clone[/u] - Summons a clone of herself for 20 seconds, but much less powerful.
[u]Black Robe[/u] - It turns into a cloud of black fog. It can not attack, but is immune to any damage.
[u]Storm[/u] - Create an ice storm in the place of the target. Targets closer to freeze and suffer more damage. Value resist: magic resist
[u]Deadly Drain[/u] - Create a force field that sucks the mana and energy of every creatures in the vicinity. Value resist: magic resist

[size=4][color=orange][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]
You need Dawnguard expansion and nothing more.
Install using NMM or manually download/extract into your Skyrim "Data" folder.

IMPORTANT!! Be sure not to be in the same cell of Lilith when you load the mod or she will not be properly leveled.

[size=4][color=orange][b]Thanks and credits[/b][/color][/size]
Lustrianna for the Daedric Armor: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17026/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17026/[/url]
author: Ciakko
